item.title: EP 12 - Hold The Mushrooms
item.itunes:title: Hold The Mushrooms
item.description:
Today we find out you can’t believe everything you see on TV and naming massive mushrooms is harder than you would think.

Patreon
https://www.patreon.com/user?u=18482113

MERCH STORE!!!
https://tinyurl.com/y8zam4o2

Ancient Aliens has been a hit show for the History Channel and many a stoner has spent long afternoons watching marathons. But what happens when a former fan of the show decided to investigate the theories himself? He makes a 3 hour documentary dismantling the entire theory. Don’t be daunted by the length, he made it easy for you to skip to the stuff you really want to see explained.

Then we travel to Oregon. Unless you are already in Oregon, then you don’t really travel anywhere. In Oregon, we will meet the world’s biggest living organism. No, it isn’t me. Jerk.

We also explore creepy caves, find out why it is better to spend your life assaulting raccoons than jumping into the ocean, and discover that drinking coconut oil and margarine that you just microwaved may make it a little hard to record a podcast.

Links:

Ancient Aliens Debunked

https://youtu.be/j9w-i5oZqaQ

Giant Mushroom Largest Living Organism

https://abcnews.go.com/Technology/story?id=120049&page=1

Listen to the daily podcast anywhere you listen to podcasts!------------------------------------------------

Logo Art By Ash Black
Opening Song: "Atlantis Attacks"
Closing Song: "Bella Royale"
Music By Dr. Huxxxtable
Hood River

http://www.DeadRabbit.com

Email: DeadRabbitRadio@gmail.com

Twitter: @DeadRabbitRadio

Facebook: www.Facebook.com/DeadRabbitRadio

Paranormal, Conspiracy, and True Crime news as it happens! Jason Carpenter breaks the stories they'll be talking about tomorrow, assuming the world doesn't end today.

All Contents Of This Podcast Copyright Jason Carpenter 2018 - 2020
